colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES PA 'DI NI 'PHRAL DU MTHO MKHO BA ZHIG BYUNG TSE, KRVA RIGS 'GA'I 'DOD PA LTAR MOD SMAD CHAGS MOD THANG PA, ^ SMON LAM RAB 'BYAMS PA PHUN TSOGS MING CAN GYI NA BA ZHIG GIS GZHAN LA PHAN PAR 'DOD KYIS BSAMS PAS, ,BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO SMAN RAMS BSTAN 'DZIN GRAGS PAS SBYAR BA'I SME BTZIGS KYI 'GONG PO BSREG CHOG LA GZHI BAR BYAS, ,SENG GDONG MA'I LAS TSOGS SOGS LAS LEGS CHA BLANGS NAS BRGYAN TE, AU CU MU CHEN GA-YAS RU'I, SA CHA'I BRAG CHEN CES PA'I RI'I NYE 'DABS SU, ,SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, ^ LCANG SKYA LA LI TA BADZRA BKA' LUNG GIS PI LIG THU GU SHRI ZHES BSNGAGS PA DGE SLONG BLO TZANG MKHAS GRUB PO, ,'DIS KYANG SEMS CAN LA PHAN 'DOGS SHING, ,BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS TU GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
